alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Westchester County through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ossining, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ossining, Peekskill, Mount Kisco, Greenwich, Hawthorne, Bedford, Yorktown Heights, Jefferson Valley, Croton-on-Hudson, Briarcliff Manor, Pleasantville, Armonk, Thornwood, Buchanan and Golden`s Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
